name: Do or Die
description: Fight against each other in intense VR Battle Royale skirmishes in Do or Die! Conquer the battlefield and escape with your life! Drop in an island full of weapons to equip, survive until the end or fight to escape alive!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit DX11/12 Processor: Intel i5-4590K equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater with 4 GB of RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 13 GB available space
